item.title: Mercedes Benz 1720 v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Mercedes Benz 1720 v1.0 ETS2

1. Fully Animated on Exterior cam (like Door, Porta, Baggage, and window).
2. Fully Animated on Interior cam (like gas, brake pedal, key, window, door, porta).
3. Support animated suspension.
3. Stable physic.
4. Include interior light (Press O to activate).
5. Include own Sound (DC13). And support Convoy Multiplayer.
6. Standalone Mods.
7. Include 4K Skins.
8. Include Animated Signs.



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: VolvoFM 1.50/1.51 ETS2

VolvoFM 1.50/1.51 ETS2

1. Fully Animated on Exterior cam (like Door, Porta, Baggage, and window).
2. Fully Animated on Interior cam (like clutch, gas, brake pedal, key, window, door, porta).
3. Stable physic.
4. Include interior light (Press O to activate).
5. Include your own Sound (OM457LA). And support Convoy Multiplayer.

item.title: IVECO HI-WAY 1.51 / 1.50 ETS2
item.description:
IVECO HI-WAY 1.51 / 1.50 ETS2

High-quality models and textures
Realistic interior
Realistic engine and transmission values
Realistic engine sound
Realistic retarder sound
Ghost screen
Roof clock
VDO Digital Tachograph
Optional cockpit trims
Michelin X COACH Z tires
Goodyear Fuel-Max LHS tires
Chrome accessories
Team bus support (Adana Demirspor, Galatasaray, Beşiktaş)
Team bus strobe light support
Team bus siren support (Air horn slot)
Passenger entertainment system (QR Code, Television)
Adjustable air conditioning sound (to “Truck Turbo” sound)
Gear options (12-speed automatic, 6-speed manual)
Customizable accessories (Flag, Sign, Plate, Mudflap)
Adjustable APP plate (HVT first in the world)
Fog light options (Parking, High beam)
DRL options (Parking, Amber Parking Light, DRL, Signal)
Baggage door warning (Factory default in Temsa Maraton buses; this is a fabrication error.)



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD
